website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding intercom system for half-helmet wearers that is just so-so when playing music.
pros: Pairs quickly with up to 4 other intercom systems
Built-in voice prompt for hands-free volume control, phone calls, GPS
Excellent microphone noise dampening lets users speak normally
cons: Music quality through this headset is not good

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. SENA ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this headset. Call quality (both listening and speaking) while riding is phenomenal. This unit is actually better than the Bluetooth headset that I use while driving in my semi truck. I've tested this going down the highway at 70MPH and the person I was speaking to could not even tell that I was riding. The Controls are easy to manipulate even while wearing riding gloves and I really enjoy the FM receiver feature.
customer_reviews.author: sassy4205

customer_reviews.title: Add the WOW dimension to your riding experience
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing device I have ever experienced, Riding motorcycles for most of my life this Sena communications headset has added a new dimension to riding. Music,talk radio,rider to rider voice communications and more. Great for long rides and the rider voice communication keeps everyone on the same page while riding, adding a level of safety to the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Iopaka

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had a Sena set for two. Like this, the pair I bought didn't fit any helmet I had. When I spoke to a rep at a rally, he told me it only fit one cheap helmet. Sena wouldn't replace it or refund it. That was several years ago. I bought this hoping it would work. Again, it doesn't fit any of the 5 helmets I tried it on. This time, it is going back and I will never trust this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Gee man

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a certified used set first and it showed up with a broken damaged wire. Obviously a customer tried to install it and damaged the wire and then returned it. I ordered a second set and it wouldn't charge. I couldn't return it because I had already disposed of the packaging. I opened an RMA with Sena and they responded with, return it to Amazon. After explaining why I couldn't, their response was "I'm sorry". Well yes you are sorry.....sorry customer service. I'm repairing it at work and found that it was just a corroded internal battery, so I ordered a replacement for $16.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Second unit I own
customer_reviews.text: Have owned lesser units that I could not hear in a 3/4 helmet. Bought my first one of these and put it in a 1/2 helmet and was amazed I could hear it with volume still to go. The FM feature is cool too. The menu is somewhat complicated and instructions are a bit lacking. Look for owners manual online. Bought the mounting kit for the 3/4 helmet and was transferring unit from helmet to helmet and finally I just got a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Orin L. Johnsten

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how well the noise attenuation works as i have a phase 1 harley that is a bit noisy. however the sound is tinny the sound can be heard well enough but music quality is like an old transistor radio. other wise works well and i use it all the time. Batteries last for several hours too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: I have a SENA 20s in my full face helmet that I've used for a couple of years and I was looking for something similar for my half helmet. I looked at some options and found these. This is a great investment. The sound quality is great, the noise cancelling is pretty good, (It sounds like driving in a car with the window down), and the ease of installation was great. My only issue is it doesn't work with the SENA app on your phone like the 20s and 30k will and that is an issue for SENA to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a half helmet setup to use primarily to connect with my phone....for cell phone contact and for listening for music. This unit works great! I do not use the intercom function, but others that I know do and claim it works great as well! I could not find any other similar unit to meet my needs and I find all of the “over the ear” systems to be very uncomfortable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: K9 Rick

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! In the words of Sena Helpdesk, ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! In the words of Sena Helpdesk, "The SPH10H is an older model which does not have the hardware capabilities to be used with the phone app." That means that some of the advertised features and functions simply will not work with your more technically modern phone.
customer_reviews.author: neighbor_jeff

customer_reviews.title: Sena hits another one out the park!
customer_reviews.text: Sena is an industry leader for good reason. Who would have thought you can have clear simple communications on a half helmet?!?! It looks dorky but it’s to useful not to have.
customer_reviews.author: OWen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible firmware updater
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. Good audio quality. But in the box, it says to get a firmware update. The firmware updater is just abysmal. Don't even bother updating it. Trust me on this one. The update is not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Custom Computer Builders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for communication, but not for music.
customer_reviews.text: I've only heard good things about Sena brand headsets. I decided on this one because I can use it on my half helmet and with the Helmet Clamp kit, I can also use it on my full face helmet. If you are looking for a great intercom device for either rider to passenger, or rider to rider communication, this is the one. The phone quality is outstanding! When I talk to people on the phone, they are surprised that I am on a motorcycle. This headset is NOT the one if you want to listen to music. The speakers sound "tinny".
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but app and software do not work.
customer_reviews.text: This unit actually is really nice to use and works as advertised. But there is no way to update it with the OS software or the app on my iPhone XS Max. I am forced to use the cumbersome buttons on the unit to program it and no way I can update to the latest firmware. Might be fine with android and/or Microsoft equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V. Zabolotny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; highly recommend! Great for half-helmet users!
customer_reviews.text: 1,000+ mile ride, on and off interstates at 75-85+ mph with 20 mph headwinds AND hearing protection. They worked beautifully!!! Now, it wasn't exactly a live, thumping concert, but with all the background noise and hearing protection, I could still sing along with my favorite tunes at highway speeds. Amazing product for half-helmet users. Used my Bell Pit boss half-helmet. Lasted a good 6-7 hours, non-stop (even through gas stops).
customer_reviews.author: sooner961

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The device I received won't turn on. It was plugged in and charged all day. Plugged it in again and got the red light as if it wasn't charged, did the process numerous times. Still can't get this device to turn on. So I have no idea if anything else works.
customer_reviews.author: ben held

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this device, but after using it for a time I have to say I am very pleased with it. I had issues with air rushing over my ears, so I purchased this headset to counter the air rush and it works great! Easy to operate one handed, and radio reception is quite good! I also use it with my phone...I would normally use the talk feature, but music is great when riding, and the air rush is now mitigated! Would seriously recommend this device, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OceanCzar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for first half-helmets!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, though I wish the stock helmet pads could be used since they are thicker to shield more from wind, cold and sound. Easy to use, though "intercom button" easy easily pressed by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Ketter Household

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sena headset, so now I have a pair. My other one does not have the FM tuner. These headsets work very well, and this model will fit more half helmet styles than my other one does. The sound is great, they look nice, and it allows me to have my GPS voice instruction, cell phone and intercom all working at the same time. The FM radio is very good, and it automatically cuts out if any of the other functions are activated so that you don't miss any communications.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard R. Mcmullen

customer_reviews.title: This is an ok system, but mounting to all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok system, but mounting to all half helmets is not guaranteed, the left side is in there with the control through the ear hole on the strap. But the right side doesn't stay on my helmet, (pit boss) the hook loop tab does not stick to any part of the helmet. It is held on with a safety pin on the outside and the elastic strap but moves around and likes to come off when not on my head. But the FM works and even without a full face people can't tell I'm on my bike when on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Sena delivers
customer_reviews.text: Voice quality is outstanding. Range is 1000ft. Mic doesn't pick up wind noise with half helmet. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wind noise an issue
customer_reviews.text: The headset was expensive and I expected a good product. The wind noise was terrible. My friend bought the same model so that we can communicate on our bikes. We could hardly hear each other when traveling highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and i could hear my music with out a problem while doing 70. The only problem i have it the velcro on it doesn't work all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have correct straps for these
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Make sure you have the Y strap. Our helmets only have one so these did not work at all. We had bought set for our full face helmets and they work fantastic. We are sorry that these didn't work for our half helmets.
customer_reviews.author: S. DelGrippo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Customer!!
customer_reviews.text: Best head sets. Beats the ones you purchase from Harley Davidson. Tested them riding 70mph and I could hear the other person just fine. Only thing you need to be aware of is the volume, it’s loud! If your looking for good head sets these are them!
customer_reviews.author: Iesha S.

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised that I found one that I liked. this works great on my bike as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that I found one that I liked. this works great on my bike as a solo rider and as a passenger on my husband's bike. FM isn't always great. Perfect for syncing to phone. It does take some getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this bluetooth comm is amazing. I can listen to the radio when riding ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this bluetooth comm is amazing. I can listen to the radio when riding alone or talk with my girlfriend on another bike easily at 55 mph down the highway. Plenty of volume even when on my Springer Softail with V&H pipes. Great product...
customer_reviews.author: P40Warhawk6

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, Won't pair with H-D Boom! Box
customer_reviews.text: Easy Installation, readily paired with my iPhone 6s, but would not pair with my 2014 Harley Davidson Boom! Box. Great Sound quality! Loud enough to hear over my stock pipes at highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Winham

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. I have another unit made to fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have another unit made to fit in the Bell mag 9 helmet and doesn't perform nearly as well. This on I can talk on the phone at 70mph and my buddies say it's very clear very little wind noise. The one in my mag 9 anything over 35/40mph and the background noise is to much to stand
customer_reviews.author: Glenn English

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: If you want to use a Bluetooth headset with a half helmet, this is your answer. Only problem I found was that the ear pads don't stay as securely attached to my helmet as much as I would like. But then, these things are intended to be a universal fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: It installed easily on her helmet due to it having a Y ...
customer_reviews.text: I ride a naked Harley Low Rider with my wife on the back using this. At 70mph I can't hear the wife talking, however, she can hear me. At 55mph I can hear her and understand what she is saying. It installed easily on her helmet due to it having a Y type strap. My helmet was not so easy. I have a single strap coming off the helmet. I had to rig it on the outside of the strap using a Velcro. Overall I'm digging them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. It pairs great with the Sena 5 that I use. There is no wind noise with the microphone even traveling down the highway. We ride with several other people who all use this brand of headset so we are linked. Communication is great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for group rides
customer_reviews.text: Great for group rides. Good for communication (and safety) while riding including Road Captain / Tail connection. Nice to be reachable by phone while riding. It occasionally drops synch but that is more of an annoyance than a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: gharbor

customer_reviews.title: The operation seemed nice and it was easy to communicate with another rider
customer_reviews.text: Only used it on one trip. The operation seemed nice and it was easy to communicate with another rider, but for me it ear flaps did not fit well with my specific helmet. The triangle formed between the helmet and the 2 chin straps was too small. Other helmets could have better luck with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Fatboy

customer_reviews.title: able to answer calls
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than I expected half helmet at 70 mph with loud exhaust
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Both work great. The reception is clear and the VOX works ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the intercom and FM radio. Both work great. The reception is clear and the VOX works well. After I paired it with my phone I can receive and make calls, listen to music and hear my GPS!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great except echo
customer_reviews.text: we have had these for a couple of months. They were well except there is an echo when talking to someone using them.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Provow

customer_reviews.title: The first Sena was for my 3/4 helmet and works great. Once we went to the half helmets
customer_reviews.text: Our second half helmet set. The first Sena was for my 3/4 helmet and works great. Once we went to the half helmets, we both had to upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the sound on both ends of the call ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the sound on both ends of the call is clear and loud. Easy to pair with many types of cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: B.P. of C.V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling was great. People couldn't even tell I was on bike or outside
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had a minor issue it stopped connecting to Pandora but I easily fixed it by following the reset directions. I highly recommend this for those who do not have a radio on your motorcycle. The Bluetooth phone part is awesome! I am able to talk without wind interference up to about 70mph.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I can listen to music (radio or ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about 9 months. I love it. I can listen to music (radio or app on phone ) I can receive calls and communicate with my other biker friends. Easy to pair. Easy to use. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L.

customer_reviews.title: These are really good. Our friends had a pair and really liked ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. Our friends had a pair and really liked them, so we got a set. The music is clear and talking back and forth is awesome. Can't wait til all four of us go out and we can talk to each other! Only talk on phone once while riding and they said I was clear and could understand me. The only bad thing I can say is they are a little tricks to get in your helmet, however with a little patience they will fit nicely..so glad we bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stapp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speaker quality very nice with little to know wind washout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a way to talk and listen to music with a half helmet this is it well worth every penny call are clear and most people dont even realize im on my bike when were talking even at 65mph!!. Only problem i have is its hard to hear how loud you are talking when riding no playback of your voice but other then that its absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Matt mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought two one for her one for me, now I can talk while riding MC
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hartford

customer_reviews.title: I love talking to my husband on this when we are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love talking to my husband on this when we are riding, or being able to listen to the radio if I so desire.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle L. Trigg

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! Crystal clear phone calls when he is on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: does not fit my HD helmet very well will have to modifi
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for calls
customer_reviews.text: Works great while listening to music, but calls...not great at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Earr buds would be better..
customer_reviews.text: It works but it needs to use earbuds instead of speakers because half helmets make too much wind noise. Riding without a wind screen talking on the phone the person on the other end could hear me very well, I couldn't understand anything that person was saying. It does work better with a wind screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I received my headset a day before a seven hour motorcycle trip - it made all the difference in the world! Loved the radio feature and had no problems picking up stations along the way. The wind reduction worked great. We both spoke in a normal voice and could hear each other easily. I highly recommend this system...and have!
customer_reviews.author: Csnowmoore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my items, they are both what I was looking for, thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I paired it up with my IPhone and GPS system, it is a great set-up so far. It was also very easy to assemble and my side straps for my helmet were not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: K. Krishan

customer_reviews.title: Sena headset
customer_reviews.text: Good headset with clear reception. I like the fact that someone can get in touch with me while riding the motorcycle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love these. They allow us to talk
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love these. They allow us to talk, talk to other riders, stream music, sync with GPS, and carry on phone conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Carter

customer_reviews.title: Made communication easy & simple between bikes
customer_reviews.text: Made communication easy & simple between bikes. Speakers are loud and clear. Made to fit certain helmet styles, others need major adjustment, radio is a little difficult to find station
customer_reviews.author: Julie Spraggins

customer_reviews.title: It is ok riding around town but when you travel ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok riding around town but when you travel at 50 or above I cannot hear the other parties. Lot of wind noise and garbled voices.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has many features. I liked it so well I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome riding with tunes and being able to make and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a cross country ride, which I'm on right now. It is awesome riding with tunes and being able to make and take calls.
customer_reviews.author: Lance L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Easy to use! Instant 2 way comm!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Easy to use! Instant 2 way communication. No push to talk or annoying voice activating circuit (VOX). Quarter mile range. Very long battery life. Loud & clear conversation on these devices, require NO yelling. Going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Ern

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used this one yet but have one like it for my full face helmet and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this one yet but have one like it for my full face helmet and it works great! You just need to make sure you have a half-helmet that this one will fit in. I'm trying a Bell Pit Boss that I think will fit but haven't received it yet.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Works great but range not even close to advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are bad ass. Wife and I took them on a test ride yesterday. Sound is great and very clear. Had the bikes up to 80mph and could still hear each other (we do have windshields though). Knocked it down a star only due to range. Advertised as 700 yards but intercom range got very static at 2/10 of a km on the hwy (little over 200 yards) and completely cut out at 275 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless over 45mph. No ability to make use of ear buds. I addition, Will not pair with any of mine or my friends SENA units. And there is no mounts to put on a 3/4, full face, or modular helmet to at least see if you can hear the FM.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We live in Michigan
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband - per his request. Since we do live in Michigan & the winter has been harder this year, he has not had opportunities yet to really put this item to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie G

customer_reviews.title: Not for just any helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install. Not designed for any helmet. I had to be creative. But it works well, just as advertised, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre At Best
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, there is a problem getting it to fit the helmet straps and wind noise is a major problem at highway speeds. The radio did work pretty good when in range of local stations. Probably would not purchase another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tec

customer_reviews.title: ... put these on our half helmets and they work great. Can hear intercom and music very well even ...
customer_reviews.text: We put these on our half helmets and they work great. Can hear intercom and music very well even at high speeds. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

product_meta.title: Sena SPH10H-FM-01 Bluetooth Stereo Headset and Intercom with Built-in FM Tuner for Half Helmets
product_meta.description:
The SPH10H-FM is a Bluetooth Headset and Intercom designed for half helmets By attaching the SPH10H-FM to your half helmet, you can call hands-free on your Bluetooth mobile phone and listen to stereo music by Bluetooth wirelessly and have intercom conversations in full duplex with other users Offers exceptional sound quality for both incoming and outgoing sound in its class Easy-to-access and intuitive button operations make the SPH10H-FM a perfect companion for motorcycle riders Bluetooth Specification v3.0 Working distance (intercom) of up to 980 yards in open terrain 4-way conference intercom Multipoint for Mobile Phone+GPS Voice prompts Bluetooth stereo headset for Bluetooth audio devices such as MP3 players Bluetooth music playback control by AVRCP (Audio Video Remote Control Profile): play, pause, track forward and track back Crystal clear and natural sound quality Simple ear pad design for quick installation to half helmets Compatible with shorty helmets in the market Easy headset controls by versatile Jog Dial Bluetooth hands free for Bluetooth mobile phones Water resistant for use in inclement weather 10 hours talk time, 7 days stand-by time Firmware upgradable Peace of mind - thanks to the 2-year warranty

AMAZON.COM


The SMH10H-FM-01 is a Bluetooth v3.0 + EDR Class 1 Stereo Headset with long-range Bluetooth Intercom designed specifically for motorcycle half-helmets. With the SMH10H-FM-01, you can call hands-free on your Bluetooth mobile phone, listen to stereo music or voice instructions of GPS navigations by Bluetooth wirelessly, and have intercom conversations in full duplex with a passenger or other motorcycle riders. This version of the SMH10H features a built-in FM radio to listen to your favorite stations in addition to intercom use.

Features include Bluetooth 3.0, multi-point connection, and conferencing for up to 4 people Thanks to the latest Bluetooth v3.0 and the advanced digital processing technology, the SMH10H-FM-01 offers the best sound quality for both incoming and outgoing sound in its class. Also, its super-thin and compact form factor contribute higher performance for sports bike riding and makes the SMH10R a perfect companion of motorcycle riders.

BLUETOOTH V3.0 WIRELESS
SMH10H-FM-01 can wirelessly connect to other Bluetooth devices supporting HSP/HFP (Headset Profile/Hands Free Profile) and A2DP (Advance Audio Distribution Profile). HSP/HFP is standard in all phones with Bluetooth features. Almost all Bluetooth MP3 players, smartphone, and audio dongles support A2DP to send stereo audio to Bluetooth headsets like the Sena SMH10H-FM-01. Enjoy Bluetooth music playback control by AVRCP: play, pause, track forward and track back.

Other Bluetooth features include Multi-Pair to allow intercom functionality for 4 persons, and compatibility with select motorcycle GPS systems.

Use as an intercom, or connect to your portable devices VOICE PROMPT
Safety is a key factor when out on the road and Sena has integrated voice prompts into all of their units to ensure riders can maintain handsfree control. Voice prompts allow riders to operate functions such as GPS, volume control, mobile phone calls and more without needing to take their hands off of the handle bars. Sena provide voice prompt options for multi-language, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.This is necessary to ensure safety is maintained during times of traffic or congestion.

INDIVIDUAL ADJUSTABLE VOLUME PROFILES
You can easily decrease/increase the volume of the voice, music and intercom using Jog Dial. The SMH10H-FM-01 can save volume levels of previously connected profiles. This means that phone volume (HSP/HFP), music volume (A2DP), and intercom volumes will be saved separately and return to its own saved volume level whenever associated profile is reconnected.

Profile volume adjustment is only affected during the use of its specific profile. However, when changing volume during standby mode, then volume change applies to all profiles. Alert tones like low battery warning and connection tones can only be adjusted in standby mode.

EASY INSTALLATION FOR MOST HELMETS
The SMH10H-FM-01 will fit onto various types of helmets. The standard clamp, included in default packaging, will fit onto most helmets. For installations which may require extra wire length, ear buds instead of speakers, and wire microphone instead of boom microphone, Sena offers different types of clamps as an additional accessory (sold separately), to allow various installations and user preferences.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
Sena SMH10H-FM-01 Bluetooth Headset, speaker/microphone clamp unit, USB power and data cable, DC vehicle charger, 3.5mm stereo audio jack cable, glued surface mounting adapter, microphone sponges, speaker pads, velcro pads, Allen wrench (for installation), microphone cap, manual, warranty.
feature_bullets: Talk time: 7 hours; Stand-by time: 6 days
Package Dimension : 8.4 cms L x 15.2 cms W x 25.4 cms H
